name: JSON to BigQuery Pipeline
description: A pipeline that reads JSON files from GCS and writes them to a BigQuery table.

parameters.name: input
parameters.label: Input GCS Path
parameters.helpText: The Google Cloud Storage location of the input JSON files.

parameters.name: output
parameters.label: Output BigQuery Table
parameters.helpText: The BigQuery table where the data will be written. Format: project:dataset.table

parameters.name: stagingLocation
parameters.label: Staging Location
parameters.helpText: The Google Cloud Storage location to stage temporary files.

parameters.name: tempLocation
parameters.label: Temporary Location
parameters.helpText: The Google Cloud Storage location to store temporary files.

parameters.name: project
parameters.label: Google Cloud Project ID
parameters.helpText: The Google Cloud project ID to run the pipeline in.
